results.title: Metformin inhibits proliferation and growth hormone secretion of GH3 pituitary adenoma cells
results.text_hl: Because @GENE_GH1 @GENE_2688 @@@growth hormone@@@-secreting @DISEASE_Pituitary_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D010911 @@@pituitary adenoma@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Growth_Hormone_Secreting_Pituitary_Adenoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D049912 @@@GH-PA@@@) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ have a high incidence of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ frequently treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, we assessed the antitumor effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Growth_Hormone_Secreting_Pituitary_Adenoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D049912 @@@GH-PA@@@.

citations.NLM: An J, Pei X, Zang Z, Zhou Z, Hu J, Zheng X, Zhang Y, He J, Duan L, Shen R, Zhang W, Zhu F, Li S, Yang H. Metformin inhibits proliferation and growth hormone secretion of GH3 pituitary adenoma cells Oncotarget. 2017 Jun 6;8(23):37538-37549. PMID: 28380462
